title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.2 - Reports of specialists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.2 - Reports of specialists

State Regulations

All specialists and consultants, except independent
medical examiners, shall file the reports prescribed for attending physicians
under section
325-1.3
of this Subpart with the
board, claimant, the claimant's attending physician, the claimant's legal
representative, if any, and the employer or insurance
carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
